SELECT type FROM vie_sys_dict WHERE del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} GROUP BY type ORDER BY type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vie_sys_dict( id, value, label, type, description, code, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{code}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE vie_sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, code = #{code}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
